Name: Early intervention program.
Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to the early intervention program
BodyName: Committee on Mental Health, Developmental Disability, Alcoholism, Substance Abuse and Disability Services

This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Mental Health, Developmental Disability, Alcoholism, Substance Abuse and Disability Services

Attachments.Name: Minutes of the Stated Meeting - January 22, 2015

Summary: This bill would remove the requirement that the early intervention program be administered by the Division of Mental Hygiene, a division within the Department of Health of Mental Hygiene, and would allow the commissioner of the Department of Mental Health and Hygiene to place the program in the newly created Division of Family and Child Health.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1. Paragraph 7 of subdivision b of section 556 of chapter 22 of the New York city charter, as added by a vote of the electors on November 6, 2001, is amended to read as follows:
	(7) administer [,within the division of mental hygiene,] the unit responsible for early intervention services pursuant to the public health law; and
	ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately upon enactment.



LS# 3514
KW
12/31/14
